snippet.title: Faulty Apprentice Opening Title (Official)
snippet.description:
Official Faulty Apprentice Opening Title!

- Wishlist us on Steam: http://bit.ly/SteamFA
- Follow us on Itch.io: http://bit.ly/FAdemo
- Support AGL studios: Patreon! http://bit.ly/PatreonAGL

---
In a world of Magic, Monsters, and Mystery, you are the Faulty Apprentice!

Take on the role of an ordinary farm boy that left home seeking a glorious apprenticeship. You have had a couple of jobs, in fact, you have had a lot, more than you can count. Why do you keep getting fired? If you can't hold an apprenticeship at this castle, there is nowhere left!

Is a lifetime of failure leading the Apprentice to a greater purpose? Or will he fail in a blaze of glory like always? Perhaps with your help and some new friends, you can turn this Faulty Apprentice into a true hero!

Please like and share to help spread the word! (=



---
Like AGLstudios on Facebook: http://facebook.com/aglstudioart
More info: AGLstudioArt.com
Follow AGLstudios on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AGLstudioArt

Art by @dinmoney
Video by @Jesika_Art
Music by @JavierKadry

Voices by 
Michelle Renee Harris @Giggles_MRH
Elissa Park - @AdoxTalks
Lauren Kawamura -@LOKawamura
Uoza - @uoza_c 
Branden M Jordan - @BradenMJordan
Connor Bushoven (BastionWorks) - @CBushoven 
Melody Muzljakovich - @voicesofmelody 
Jenna Kathleen - @jenna_wenna
Olivia Steele - @AuroraGuinivere 
Chris "Flog" Smith - @Areyougaming1
Robert Allen - @VoicesofRobert 
Amber Lee Connors: @AmberLeeConnors
